pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spectral Irradiance Data for Lamps // Spectral emission data for some frequently used lamps excluding led emitting diodes (LEDs) available as electronic components. Original spectral irradiance data for incandescent-, LED- and discharge lamps are included. They are complemented by data on the effect of temperature on the emission by fluorescent tubes. Part of the 'r4photobiology' suite, Aphalo P. J. (2015) doi:10.19232/uv4pb.2015.1.14.
